summary: Forms Manager Explicit Translate Icon Buttons - All 9 Features Verified. Typing in EN no longer auto-translates. User must click translate icon (Languages lucide icon) to fill ES/ZH. On save, EN is copied to empty ES/ZH as fallback. All data-testid selectors working correctly.
passed_tests: Translate icon (Languages) visible next to Label EN with data-testid='translate-labels-btn'
Typing 'Gender' in EN does NOT auto-fill ES/ZH (they remain empty)
Clicking translate icon fills ES='Género', ZH='性别' from dictionary
Field key auto-generates from EN label (e.g., 'Gender' -> 'gender')
Reset button clears EN, ES, ZH labels
Dropdown type shows translate icon for new option (data-testid='translate-new-option-btn')
Typing 'Cash' and clicking translate fills ES='Efectivo', ZH='现金'
Saving without translate copies EN to empty ES/ZH as fallback (verified via API)
critical_code_review_comments: FormsManagerModule.jsx correctly implements explicit translate buttons with proper data-testid attributes
handleEnLabelChange only auto-generates field_key, no auto-translate
handleSubmit implements EN->ES/ZH fallback for empty fields before saving
Languages icon from lucide-react used for all translate buttons
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_FallbackTest field to verify fallback behavior, then deleted it

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are live and functional

context_for_next_testing_agent: Forms Manager explicit translate icons fully implemented. Navigation: Admin > Administration sidebar > Forms tab > Order Form. Key test-ids: translate-labels-btn (field labels), translate-new-option-btn (new option row), translate-option-{idx} (existing options). Translation dictionary has 104 entries including Gender->Género/性别 and Cash->Efectivo/现金. The EN->ES/ZH fallback on save is implemented in handleSubmit.

explicit_translate_buttons.behavior: Click to translate, no auto-translate on typing

no_auto_translate_on_typing.test: Typed 'Gender' in EN, ES/ZH remained empty until translate click

fallback_on_save.behavior: Empty ES/ZH filled with EN content before save
